title: Change my personal details
applicationTitle: I want to change my personal details
text:
Use this form to apply to change the personal details you gave when making your claim.

If you change your postal or email address, we’ll send any letters to the new address.

If you change your telephone number, we’ll contact you using the new number if we have questions about your claim.

Details you can apply to change:

name
sex and preferred title
contact or home address 
telephone number
email address
